item.title: Open-sources and Apps
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: MQTT-Remote This is a web-based remote control for a led. It is a soft button on web that works in sync with hardware button. ☞ Live Demo ☞ Github ☞ Learn More ModelViewer WebXR and 3D Printing Demonstrations ☞ Live Demo ☞ Github ☞ Learn WebXR 3D Book Add pages to the book, and turn them like real pages. ☞ Github ☞ Book launch - Five thoughtful years
